chapters.title: Chapter 31: A Promise to Lews Therin
chapters.info: Namine Tasil, p. 471—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah and eldest daughter of Quillin. Cadsuane found that she had a casual yet keen understanding of current events—extremely uncommon in a Brown. She suspected well-connected parents, so she followed the connection and made her father one of her eyes-and-ears in Bandar Eban. See also Tasil, Quillin.
